languages.text: "Император хранит тебя, несмотря на происки врагов. Значит, твоя служба все еще угодна Ему".
"The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."
languages.original_text: "Император хранит тебя, несмотря на происки врагов. Значит, твоя служба все еще угодна Ему".

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."
"The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."
"The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."
"The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."
"The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

languages.text: 「敵の策略にもかかわらず、皇帝陛下は君を守っている。それはつまり、君の奉仕がまだ陛下にとって有用だということだ」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: 「敵の策略にもかかわらず、皇帝陛下は君を守っている。それはつまり、君の奉仕がまだ陛下にとって有用だということだ」

languages.text: "Der Imperator beschützt Euch, trotz der Umtriebe unserer Feinde. Das bedeutet, Eure Dienste sind immer noch von Wert für Ihn."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator beschützt Euch, trotz der Umtriebe unserer Feinde. Das bedeutet, Eure Dienste sind immer noch von Wert für Ihn."

languages.text: « L'Empereur vous protège, malgré les machinations de nos ennemis. Cela signifie que vous Lui êtes encore utile. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur vous protège, malgré les machinations de nos ennemis. Cela signifie que vous Lui êtes encore utile. »

languages.text: «El Emperador le protege, a pesar de las intrigas de nuestros enemigos. Eso quiere decir que sus servicios aún le son de utilidad».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador le protege, a pesar de las intrigas de nuestros enemigos. Eso quiere decir que sus servicios aún le son de utilidad».

languages.text: “尽管人类之敌诡计多端，但帝皇依然在守护着你。这意味着，祂依然需要你的侍奉。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: “尽管人类之敌诡计多端，但帝皇依然在守护着你。这意味着，祂依然需要你的侍奉。”

languages.text: "Düşmanlarımızın entrikalarına rağmen İmparator seni koruyor. Bu demektir ki hizmetinin hâlâ O'na faydası dokunuyor."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor protects you, despite our enemies' machinations. That means your service is still of use to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanlarımızın entrikalarına rağmen İmparator seni koruyor. Bu demektir ki hizmetlerin hâlâ O'na faydası dokunuyor."
